name: Compu Trivia: 1994 Edition
overview: An update to the original 1985 OziSoft release of the game. This brings thing up to date, 90's style with all new questions and updated answers. It is a game where you move around the game board based on correct answers trivia questions, a non-trivial pursuit by my estimation. The game board is a set of shoals your game boat token must move around and place over the fish to win.
